Postdoc
Department of Mathematics
Rutgers University–Newark

I like thinking about topics related to outer automorphisms of free groups and mapping classes of surface diffeomorphisms. I’m curious about geometric topology, geometric group theory, Teichmüller theory, tropical geometry, orbifolds, cube complexes, etc.
Curriculum Vitae: PDF

I earned my PhD in Mathematics from Tufts University, where my advisor was Kim Ruane. In the fall I will be a postdoc at Rutgers University–Newark. My mentor at Rutgers is Lee Mosher.

My email address is rylee.lyman@rutgers.edu.
